[console_scripts]
pages = pages.scripts:main

[pages.template_plugins]
chameleon = pages.templateplugins:ChameleonRenderer
genshi = pages.templateplugins:GenshiRenderer
jinja2 = pages.templateplugins:Jinja2Renderer
kajiki = pages.templateplugins:KajikiRenderer
kajiki-text = pages.templateplugins:KajikiTextRenderer
kajiki-xml = pages.templateplugins:KajikiXMLRenderer
piglet = pages.templateplugins:PigletRenderer
